title: ‘It’s Bittersweet’: Top Reactions from McNulty, Evenepoel, Vingegaard, and More
content:
From Plapp to Wiebes, and Van Dijk to Skjelmose, here's what the stars said: 'The race started hard, got harder, went full-gas, and then just went ridiculous.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Bittersweet’: Top Reactions from McNulty, Evenepoel, Vingegaard, and More on Velo.
author: ahood
